I went here last night for dinner.  It was fantastic. I had the "Pavo Milanesa" which is lightly fried and crispy turkey, served with delicious french fries. I also had a bottle of the house rose and the house salad.  Fantastic.  Our server Joanna, was very attentive and kind and even let us buy some bottles of wine to go.  I highly recommend Bosque Palermo.
